method.name: setLocal
method.description: Sets the Announcer that should be used to send announcements to the local desktop.

method.name: getPassword
method.description: The password to use for announcements.

method.name: getUsername
method.description: The username to use for announcements.

method.name: announce
method.description:
Sends an announcement of the given type.
param:msg The content of the announcement
param:type The announcement type.

method.name: getLocal
method.description:
Returns an Announcer that sends announcements to the local desktop, if a notification mechanism is available.

returns:The announcer.

property.name: password
property.description: The password to use for announcements.

property.name: local
property.description:
Returns an Announcer that sends announcements to the local desktop, if a notification mechanism is available.

returns:The announcer.

property.name: username
property.description: The username to use for announcements.
